plot: Heera (Kunal Goswami) is a Hindu but loves a beautiful young girl, Ruby (Maneesha Kohli) who is Catholic. Ruby's dad, Steven (Satyen Kappu) strongly opposes any ties between the two lovers,...
title: Do Gulab
